H3.text: who did cam newton sign with. Carolina Panthers

A4.text: On November 11, 2021, the Panthers signed Cam Newton to a one-year deal after Darnold was put on injured reserve.

A5.text: On March 24, the Carolina Panthers released their 2011 first overall pick and 2015 MVP quarterback Cam Newton.
